CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Negotiation stage positioned above or below the Sale Closed stage?
SRP.A: The Negotiation stage is positioned {above} the Sale Closed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {67}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Viewed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Viewed is {116}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Inquiries?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Inquiries is {183}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {300}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Sale Closed, with a value of {42}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Listed to stage Initial Inquiries?
SC.A: Decreased by {117} Properties from stage Property Listed to stage Initial Inquiries.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 91? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {300}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {183}, the {Property Viewed} stage has {116}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 45? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 58 and 149? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Viewed} stage has {116}, the {Negotiation} stage has {67}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Listed to Initial Inquiries, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Listed} to {Initial Inquiries} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Property Listed to Initial Inquiries?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Listed} to stage {Initial Inquiries} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Property Listed} and {Initial Inquiries} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Sale Closed} stages.
